data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Union Berlin drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 4, Christopher Trimmel for Union Berlin gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Dortmund at An der alten Forsterei.
Harm Osmers awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Dortmund to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Harm Osmers signals a Dortmund throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Dortmund's Jadon Sancho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Union Berlin defender.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
Dortmund drives forward and Jadon Sancho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Dortmund close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of Dortmund.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
In the minute 17, Taiwo Awoniyi of Union Berlin smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Union Berlin's Cedric Teuchert gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Dortmund have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Throw-in high up the field for Union Berlin in Berlin.
Important block from the Dortmund defence as Taiwo Awoniyi fires in a strike for Union Berlin.
In the minute 20, Union Berlin's Sheraldo Becker breaks free at An der alten Forsterei. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
Dortmund awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Dortmund.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
Harm Osmers signals a Union Berlin throw-in in Dortmund's half.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Union Berlin drive upfield and Cedric Teuchert gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dortmund defender.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Union Berlin.
Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
Union Berlin's Sheraldo Becker gets in a shot on goal at An der alten Forsterei. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Dortmund at An der alten Forsterei.
In the minute 31, Dortmund push forward at An der alten Forsterei and Youssoufa Moukoko gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Union Berlin defence.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Dortmund in the half of Union Berlin.
Union Berlin to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
Harm Osmers signals a Union Berlin throw-in in Dortmund's half.
In the minute 37, Cedric Teuchert (Union Berlin) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Goal kick for Dortmund at An der alten Forsterei.
In the minute 39, Harm Osmers awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Dortmund.
Dortmund are pushing forward but Emre Can's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 40, Union Berlin have a goal kick.
Harm Osmers awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
In the minute 44, In Berlin Union Berlin attack through Marius Bulter. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
Dortmund's Youssoufa Moukoko is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, In Berlin, Jadon Sancho of Dortmund is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
The first half has been concluded at An der alten Forsterei.
The second-half is underway at An der alten Forsterei.
In the minute 46, Free kick Dortmund.
Harm Osmers signals a throw-in for Dortmund, close to Union Berlin's area.
Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Union Berlin are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
In the minute 53, Dortmund to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Union Berlin pushes forward through Cedric Teuchert, whose finish on goal is saved.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Taiwo Awoniyi heads in to make it 1-0 at An der alten Forsterei.
That's a fine assist from Grischa Promel.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
Union Berlin needs to be cautious. Dortmund have an attacking throw-in.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
In the minute 60, Youssoufa Moukoko grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at An der alten Forsterei.
Great play from Raphael Guerreiro to set up the goal.
Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dortmund's half?
In the minute 61, Can Union Berlin capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dortmund's half?
Dortmund are in shooting range from this free kick.
At An der alten Forsterei, Marius Bulter has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 63, Important block from the Union Berlin defence as Giovanni Reyna fires in a strike for Dortmund.
Dortmund pushes forward through Youssoufa Moukoko, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 64, Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
Harm Osmers awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of Dortmund.
Keita Endo is replacing Marius Bulter for the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Free kick Union Berlin.
Dortmund's Axel Witsel has been booked in Berlin.
Harm Osmers signals a Union Berlin throw-in in Dortmund's half.
In the minute 69, Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Union Berlin to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
Edin Terzic (Dortmund) is making a first substitution, with Julian Brandt replacing Marco Reus.
In the minute 72, Urs Fischer is making the team's second substitution at An der alten Forsterei with Julian Ryerson replacing Christopher Trimmel.
Youssoufa Moukoko (Dortmund) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Emre Can of Dortmund gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
In the minute 75, Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Goal! A Marvin Friedrich header gives Union Berlin a 2-1 lead in Berlin.
In the minute 78, Cedric Teuchert instrumental with a fine assist.
Dortmund have a dangerous throw-in.
Dortmund's Jude Bellingham gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 80, Union Berlin have a goal kick.
Mateu Morey is replacing Thomas Meunier for Dortmund at An der alten Forsterei.
The away team have replaced Emre Can with Jude Bellingham. This is the third substitution made today by Edin Terzic.
In the minute 81, Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Giovanni Reyna (Dortmund) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Nico Schulz is on a sub for Manuel Akanji for Dortmund.
Union Berlin make their fourth substitution with Niko Giesselmann replacing Cedric Teuchert.
Urs Fischer (Union Berlin) is making a third substitution, with Akaki Gogia replacing Taiwo Awoniyi.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Berlin.
Free kick for Dortmund in the half of Union Berlin.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
Union Berlin have a goal kick.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
Harm Osmers awards the away team a throw-in.
The match has come to a close in Berlin. The final score is 2-1.
